import { Container, Row, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap" import './about.css' import myPhoto from '../media/images/andre-miranda.jpg' export const About = () => { return (

About me

Hello, i'm André Miranda and i am a happy portuguese young developer living in Finland.

Having lived all my life around sports, more specifically football, in 2021 i found that a change in my life would be needed and i decided to start studying Web Development. While keeping my career as a professional football coach, i started to study the basics of programing.

Programing has became since then my highest passion and my life as changed from the football field to the computing world. While i'm still studying and developing my skills on this vast new world, i'm also developing my own projects, in order to developeras much as possible

you can ceck all my project in here.

In this moment my main skills are based on:

  • Javascript
  • Reactjs
  • CSS
  • HTML
  • Nodejs

As opposite to what is thought for many people, tech world is not a lonely and solitaire path. People helps people, so, please, feel free to contact me and share your opinion with me about my projects

You can find my contacts Here.
) }
